content: When you awaken, you'll finally find out what happened to your friend Zhu Bajie -- he's also been captured, and forced to fight in here against another familiar face: The Macaque Chief. It's time for the final round.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Yellowbrow'.
The content is as follows:
When you awaken, you'll finally find out what happened to your friend Zhu Bajie -- he's also been captured, and forced to fight in here against another familiar face: The Macaque Chief. It's time for the final round.
